DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate our 10 year experience of retinopathy of prematurity screening.
DOC.brief_title: Retinopathy of Prematurity:Summary of a Decade
DOC.criteria: Neonates either with a BW of less than 1501 gram (g) or born at a GA of 34 weeks (wk) or less selected infants with an unstable clinical course were included
